sources.title: Now or Never
sources.description: Title: Now or Never Summary: A visitor to a big city gets involved in intrigue when a look-alike jewel thief sets out to doublecross his gang. Directed by: Bernard B. Ray Actors: Production Company: Reliable Pictures Corporation (I) Release Date: 9 July 1935 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Dick Raney, a young athlete, is mysteriously attacked by a gang of crooks at a railroad station, who have mistaken him for Noman Gray, a diamond broker and an identical look-alike for Raney. Dick's love of adventure draws him into a desperate exercise, in which the stake is a valuable packet of diamonds.

sources.title: Now or Never (1935) RICHARD TALMADGE
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents Classic Movie Monday
Starring: Richard Talmadge "The Dare Devil of the Screen"
Co-Starring: Janet Chandler, Tom Ricketts, and the Metzetti troupe
Director: Bernard B. Ray

In this rough-and-tumble Poverty Row production, a visitor to the City of Angels is lured into a scheme when a look-alike jewel thief sets out to doublecross his gang!

TRIVIA: "Now or Never" was the 2nd of six action stunt melodramas Richard Talmadge starred in for Reliable Pictures. The other films were Fighting Pilot, The Live Wire, The Speed Reporter, Step on It, and Never Too Late. Producer Bernard B. Ray and his partner, Harry S. Webb, listed their office at 1420 No. Beachwood Drive, in Poverty Row just south of Sunset.

metadata.Plot: Dick Raney, a young athlete, is mysteriously attacked by a gang of crooks at a railroad station, who have mistaken him for Noman Gray, a diamond broker and an identical look-alike for Raney. Dick's love of adventure draws him into a desperate exercise, in which the stake is a valuable packet of diamonds.
metadata.Actors: Richard Talmadge, Janet Chandler, Eddie Davis
